title: Internship on Path
description: Path is an international nonprofit organization that works to advance health equity. They are dedicated to creating sustainable, scalable health solutions by leveraging innovation, partnerships, and science to tackle the world’s toughest health challenges.

title: Internship on Nasscom Foundation
description: Nasscom Foundation is a nonprofit organization working to drive social change through technology. By leveraging India's IT sector’s expertise, it supports initiatives in areas like education, skill development, and healthcare, aiming to create inclusive, equitable growth for marginalized communities.

title: Internship on American India Foundation
description: The American India Foundation (AIF) is an organization that works towards bridging the divide between India and the United States while focusing on building sustainable livelihoods and social justice in India through education, health, and leadership development programs.

title: Internship on Urban Governance
description: Janaagraha is a nonprofit organization that works on making urban India more citizen-friendly through reforms in governance, civic participation, and infrastructure. Their key initiatives involve improving urban services, empowering citizens, and promoting transparency in governance.

title: Internship on The Convergence Foundation
description: The Convergence Foundation is dedicated to improving education and healthcare for underprivileged communities across India. They work with grassroots organizations and governments to design and implement solutions that create sustainable change and better living conditions.

title: Internship on Madhi Foundation
description: The Madhi Foundation is focused on providing quality education, healthcare, and livelihood support to disadvantaged communities in rural and semi-urban areas. Their mission is to empower marginalized individuals and create opportunities for self-reliance and dignity.

title: Internship on PETA India
description: PETA India is a nonprofit animal rights organization that campaigns for the protection and welfare of animals. Their advocacy spans across various issues including cruelty-free products, vegetarianism, and animal rights law, striving for a world where animals are no longer exploited.

title: Internship on Defense Research (CSDR)
organization: Council for Strategic and Defense Research (CSDR)
description: CSDR focuses on research and analysis in defense policy and strategic issues. It aims to provide the government and military with research-backed insights into national security, defense technology, and geopolitics.

title: Internship on Samhita
description: Samhita is a social impact organization that works to drive sustainable change by connecting corporates, nonprofits, and governments. They support organizations in crafting innovative strategies to address key challenges in health, education, and livelihood sectors.

title: Internship on Rocket Learning
description: Rocket Learning is an education-focused social enterprise that works on improving foundational literacy and numeracy skills for children in underserved communities. They aim to reach millions of children through community-driven, tech-enabled learning solutions.

title: Internship on WRI India
description: WRI India is a research organization that works on environmental and sustainability issues in India. They focus on creating solutions in sectors such as energy, water, and cities to promote sustainable development and reduce environmental impact.

title: Internship on Haqdarshak
description: Haqdarshak is a social enterprise that empowers marginalized communities to access government entitlements and services. They provide technology solutions to improve the delivery of services like healthcare, education, and financial assistance.

title: Internship on ASER Centre/Pratham
description: ASER Centre, the research wing of Pratham, is focused on improving educational quality through evidence-based research and assessment. The organization conducts the Annual Status of Education Report (ASER), which provides insights into learning outcomes across India.

title: Internship on J-PAL
description: J-PAL is a global research center that uses randomized evaluations to understand what works in reducing poverty. They collaborate with governments and organizations to implement evidence-backed interventions in sectors such as education, health, and governance.

title: Internship on ID Insight
description: ID Insight is a global advisory and data science organization that works to help social sector organizations make evidence-based decisions. They specialize in creating and scaling up innovative solutions in areas like education, health, and economic development.

title: Internship on Arpan
description: Arpan is a nonprofit organization that works on preventing child sexual abuse and supporting survivors. They provide training, resources, and advocacy to build awareness and promote a safe environment for children.

title: Internship on ESYA Centre
description: ESYA Centre is a think tank focused on policy research, advocacy, and capacity building for sustainable development in India. They work on issues related to energy, environment, and climate change to promote a sustainable future.

title: Internship on Satyarthi Children’s Foundation
description: Kailash Satyarthi Children’s Foundation works to eliminate child labor and ensure children’s right to education. The foundation, led by Nobel laureate Kailash Satyarthi, advocates for policies and practices to protect children from exploitation and provide them with opportunities for education.

title: Internship on GIZ
description: GIZ is a German development agency that focuses on sustainable international cooperation. In India, GIZ works on development programs that address issues such as climate change, sustainable energy, health, and governance to promote equitable growth.

title: Internship on Belongg
description: belongg is an HR technology company that focuses on creating inclusive workplaces through data-driven diversity and inclusion solutions. They aim to help organizations build a culture of belonging for all employees, regardless of their background or identity.
